action: Tap 'Next button to proceed with registration'
observation: I can see a sign-up form with email and password fields that have been filled out. The email field contains 'ai.test.user@example.com' and the password field shows dots indicating 'SecurePass123!' has been entered. There's a 'Next' button available to proceed with the registration flow.
reasoning: As an elderly user, I can see the form is properly filled out with the required information. The Next button is clearly visible and appears to be the logical next step to continue the registration process. The button is large enough and has good contrast for my needs.

evidence.actual_outcome: Tap 'Next button to proceed with registration'

dual_diagnosis.visual_observation: The page appears to have completely reset or navigated to a different state. The BEFORE screenshot shows a registration form with email field (ai.test.user@example.com), password field (with masked input), and a Next button. The AFTER screenshot shows only the Specter.AI logo and a Sign Up button in the top right, with no form content visible.
dual_diagnosis.diagnosis: The tap on Next button did not progress the sign-up flow as expected. Instead, it appears to have either reset the page, navigated away from the form, or caused a rendering failure that cleared all form content.
